clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: We may suspend or terminate your access to the Services at any time for any reason

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: You are not being tracked
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: We don’t track or profile you.

case.text: You are not being tracked

clauses.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that periodically delete their logs to prevent user sessions being tracked over time.
clauses.clause_text: Email logs are stored for up to three months.

case.text: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: Through Vivaldi Community Services, you can directly access, edit, delete or export your personal data

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text: To respect your privacy we anonymize your IP address so that we only know where you come from and what type of hardware you use allowing us to make sure that the website renders well where you are using the machine you have.

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis
clauses.clause_text: We protect user data from disclosure, with exceptions only requested by law or court order.

case.text: Third parties are not allowed to access your personal information without a legal basis

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: The information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous.

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
clauses.description: User accounts can be terminated for having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly, meaning they cannot be terminated without a reason, but only for a limited number of reasons. Additionally, user accounts will not be deleted after a first infringement.
clauses.clause_text:
We agree to:

If you violate any of the above, your account will be suspended or terminated, and you may be exposed to civil and criminal sanctions.

case.text: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your content
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text:
The content and material you publish on our forums and blogs is yours only, and Vivaldi does not claim ownership to any of your uploads.
We only use, copy, display, distribute and adapt your content for the purpose of running the forums and blog services.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text:
Retention and deletion

Vivaldi will delete personal information when all purposes of the personal information processing have been fulfilled and when deletion is allowed pursuant to applicable laws and regulations.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text:
Vivaldi’s headquarters are based in the beautiful city of Oslo, Norway.
This EULA is therefore governed by the laws of Norway, except its conflict of laws rules and regulations

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
Your rights

Under certain circumstances, you have the following rights by the GDPR in relation to our processing of your personal data.

  • The right to obtain confirmation that your data is being processed and access to your personal data and other supplementary information
  • The right to have personal data rectified
  • The right to have personal data erased and to prevent processing
  • The right to restrict processing
  • The right to data portability

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website
clauses.description: The service provides users with a complete list of all first and third party cookies its website sets and an explanation of their uses. This information can be valuable for users to make an informed choice whether to allow those cookies.
clauses.clause_text:
Below is a detailed list of the cookies we use on our Website. Our Website is scanned with our cookie scanning tool regularly to maintain a list as accurate as possible. We classify cookies in the following categories:

  • Strictly Necessary Cookies;
  • Security Cookies;
  • Anonymous Performance Cookies.
Strictly Necessary Cookies

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems.

case.text: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided

clauses.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text: You are entitled to lodge a complaint with a competent data protection regulator if you consider that we have breached your data protection rights.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not share or sell your personal data with any third party.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.
clauses.description: The Service provides a list detailing the third parties involved, their roles, and may even provide more information.
clauses.clause_text: We also list all the third parties we use in the browser. To see these, please copy and paste the following in Vivaldi’s address bar: vivaldi://credits

case.text: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.

clauses.title: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.
clauses.description: The Service promises to fairly terminate users accounts, only with a reason, and may give them an opportunity to explain and defend themselves.
clauses.clause_text: If the service disables your account, you have the opportunity to contact them in case it's a mistake.

case.text: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.

clauses.title: The user is informed about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
We are committed to safeguarding and protecting your personal data and will implement and maintain appropriate technical and organisational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to protect your personal data from accidental or unauthorised destruction, loss, alteration, disclosure or access.

Procedures are reviewed regularly to ensure that the policies are followed. Any non-conformance regarding the policies will be corrected without unnecessary delay.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: When you close your Vivaldi account, your data is immediately deleted from our production servers except for emails which might be retained for up to seven days.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: You can unsubscribe from any of our communications at any time by clicking on “unsubscribe” link at the bottom of each email or visit https://vivaldi.com/newsletter/unsubscribe.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
clauses.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent) may be removed, with or without notice.
clauses.clause_text: The information on the Website is not prescreened or censored by Vivaldi, but we may remove any information posted on the Website without notice if we have reason to believe that it violates the Terms of Use.

case.text: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

clauses.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.
clauses.clause_text:
This Privacy Statement may be updated or changed.
When we post changes to this Privacy Statement, we will include the date when the Privacy Statement was last updated.
If there are material changes to this statement or in how we use your personal information, we will notify you either by prominently posting a notice of such changes prior to implementing the change or by directly sending you a notification

case.text: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but in this case some parts of the site may not work.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last modified and effective: December 9, 2020.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: We do our best to provide the best community environment, however, we cannot be liable for any kind of damage, direct or consequential, resulting from your use of our Website.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text: We do not guarantee that access to our Website will always be available or uninterrupted.

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: You may only use the Software and Services for personal use

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text:
Your account should not be used to:

  • Distribute spam or unsolicited commercial content.

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
clauses.description: Once users have been permanently banned from this service, they are not allowed to create a new account to keep using the service.
clauses.clause_text: Create or use multiple accounts to abuse Vivaldi policies, bypass Vivaldi account limitations, circumvent filters or otherwise subvert restrictions placed on your account. (For example, if you’ve been blocked by another user or have had your Vivaldi account disabled due to abuse, don’t create a replacement account that engages in the similar activity.)

case.text: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text:
You agree to not do the following:
  • Harass other members of the community.
    • <

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: The Website and all the Website elements are provided on an “as is” basis.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text: Unless you have their explicit permission, you will not access another user’s Vivaldi Community account.

case.text: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

clauses.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.
clauses.clause_text: You agree to not do the following: [...] Upload/publish content or material that is obscene, defamatory, vulgar, sexually oriented, hateful, harassing or threatening."

case.text: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: "You agree to not do the following: [...] Use our service for illegal purposes"

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.
clauses.clause_text:
This EULA does not apply to third party software or services that Vivaldi may deliver with Software or Services.
Vivaldi assumes no responsibility or liability for such “Third Party Software or Services”.

case.text: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: This means that we cannot guarantee the accuracy and timeliness of information available.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
The visitor statistics include information about the visitor’s truncated IP-address, usage patterns, the point in time the visitor visits our websites on Vivaldi.net and Vivaldi.com and information about the browser and operating system the visitor uses.

This information is collected solely for statistical purpose and is not used to identify individuals.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: This service requires first-party cookies
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text: These cookies are set by us and called first-party cookies.

case.text: First-party cookies are used
